result.trip_overview_narrative: The B.K. Birla Centre for Education organizes field trips and educational excursions throughout the academic year as an integral part of out-of-school learning, providing practical learning experiences outside the classroom.

evidence.quote: Field trips and educational excursions are an integral part of the out-of-school learning experience at the B.K. Birla Centre for Education. These trips are organized throughout the academic year to provide students with practical learning experiences outside the classroom.

unknowns: Other types of trips such as overnight, international, expedition, service learning, or exchange
